Bits of math

Sharing bits of mathematics that I've come across in my ~10 years as a professional mathematical engineer.

Welcome! I am Lense, a Belgian mathematical engineer. Since 2012 I have been employed at Sioux Technologies in Eindhoven (in the Netherlands), currently being the technology manager on optimization in the Mathware department.

This blog is to host some applied mathematical output of mine. Some work related, but mostly not.

Check the about page for more info on me.
